entities.name: person
entities.description: A person involved in AI development or investment. This is a person's name, not a company. Example: Zhan, Andrew Ng.

entities.name: company
entities.description: A company involved in AI. Examples: Google, Harvey, Sequoia.

entities.name: technology
entities.description: A platform, tool, or other specific application of AI technology. Examples: Google Brain, OpenAI, LLaMA.

relations.name: advised_by
relations.description: Indicates that a person was advised or mentored by another person in a professional or academic setting.

relations.name: works_at
relations.description: Indicates that a person works at a company.

relations.name: founded
relations.description: Indicates that a person founded a company.

relations.name: invested_in
relations.description: Indicates that a company made an investment in another company.

relations.name: focuses_on
relations.description: Indicates that a company has a specialty in a specific technology.

patterns.head: person
patterns.description: A person was advised by another person.

patterns.head: person
patterns.description: A person works at a company.

patterns.head: company
patterns.description: A fund invested in a company.

patterns.head: company
patterns.description: A company focuses on a specific technology.
